    Filters dish data received from database by dish category.

    Creates a list of receipts from a data extracted from a database by user's id.

    UserDAO.getUserByLogin(String login)
    Creates a new User object with data from a database extracted by user's login.
    User

    Checks if user with such login and password exists in database and if so creates a new User object from a result set.
    void
    CartDAO.submitOrder(int userId, Map<Dish,Integer> cart)
    Creates new receipt in database and inserts data about dishes in it.
